name: Foresaken
description:
This game is set in an abandoned space mining facility blast through enemies has 3 weapons starting with pistol , shotgun and  an assault rifle. Inspired by games like doom ,duke nukem 3d and dead space trilogy. 

gameplay:

Has explorable map and replayable gameplay with focus on jumpscares ambience over constant combat equal balance of all types of gameplay. There is checkpoints so you wont have to save manually or be worried of dying.
